description: [OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0352) uses a shell script as the main executable inside an app bundle and drops an embedded base64-encoded payload to the /tmp folder.(Citation: Trend Micro MacOS Backdoor November 2020)(Citation: sentinelone apt32 macOS backdoor 2020)

external_references.description: Magisa, L. (2020, November 27). New MacOS Backdoor Connected to OceanLotus Surfaces. Retrieved December 2, 2020.
Phil Stokes. (2020, December 2). APT32 Multi-stage macOS Trojan Innovates on Crimeware Scripting Technique. Retrieved September 13, 2021.
